title: The Seasonal (shijie/时节) Dinner at Initial Research
description: Join us for The Seasonal (shijie/时节) Dinner at Initial Research, a community gathering marking the beginning of each new season.

additional_sections.title: About the Dinner
additional_sections.content: Each seasonal dinner reflects the changing times of year through shared meals, conversation, and community. We gather to mark transitions, celebrate the present moment, and connect with one another through food and dialogue.

additional_sections.title: Upcoming Dates
additional_sections.content:
Spring Dinner: March 20, 2025
Summer Dinner: June 21, 2025
Autumn Dinner: September 22, 2025
Winter Dinner: December 21, 2025
